name: PaintFacts
0:
”Alexa ask paint facts for a paint fact”
”Alexa ask paint facts to give me a paint fact”
”Alexa ask paint facts to give me a paint trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: paint facts
des: This Alexa skill helps you learn interesting facts about paint. Let Alexa help you learn things new and unknown facts about paint! Simply ask Alexa to ask the skill "paint facts" for a fact. Here are a few simple invocations, "Alexa ask paint facts for a paint fact" or "Alexa ask paint facts to give me a paint trivia"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
